column4: Anybody know why all of the download links to Feisty for PowerPC are coming back 404s?  Does it actually exist?
That's unbelievable.  Ubuntu actually abandoned the platform before Apple stopped supporting it.  I'm disappointed.
With limited resources, sometimes you have to pick and choose.  I have an old G3 PowerMac sitting here that I wanted to try it on, but I understand that I'm fairly rare.
